entry.title: Late Night Calls and Grey and Blue
entry.summary:
Author: nocturnalglances

Rating: Teen And Up AudiencesLanguage: EnglishWords: 13,185Chapters: 5/5Kudos: 8

Summary: Buck doesn’t know how it started if he was being honest. Just an impulse. Maybe even less than that. One neuron firing blindly in the middle of the night on their first day off, when he couldn’t sleep, when the world seemed to simply cave in until there was nothing else except him and the oppressing blues and greys in the absence of light. A frightening absence of warmth. Unable, or unwilling he gave in to this one electric spark. Igniting the faint promise of something to shield him from the cold.-Buck starts calling Eddie, out of the blue and in the middle of the night. Until it becomes a habit that Eddie seems to be less then fond of. But why can't he stop and why does it bother Eddie so much?

entry.title: Lightning Doesn't Strike Twice
entry.summary:
Author: WellHelloHello

Rating: Teen And Up AudiencesLanguage: EnglishWords: 15,028Chapters: 1/3Kudos: 0

Summary: “Hen? Is everything okay?” Athena sounded understandably worried, it was rare Hen called her out of the blue whilst on shift.“A-Athena, you need to get down to Prespytarian, now.” Hen’s voice was weak and shaky, the adrenalin leaving her, only fear and exhaustion remaining.There was a pause on the other end, one too long to be considered normal, but eventually Athena spoke “Which one?”“It’s Buck.” Hen sniffled, trying to stay strong, “Athena, s-she was struck by lightning.”Or:Buck's lightning coma lasts far longer than it did in canon and the consequences are far worse.

entry.title: And somehow, I found my way back to you
entry.summary:
Author: mostly_luminous

Rating: Not RatedLanguage: EnglishWords: 23,106Chapters: 5/?Kudos: 35

Summary: Evan Buckley hides his pain to avoid burdening others, always putting their needs first. Seen as strong and dependable, he silently struggles while earning praise for having it all together. But no one realizes the emotional cost of being the one everyone relies on—because he never shows how broken he really feels inside.And then, he just wants to stop. Maybe start something new. Somewhere far.So, he left... the 118, his sister, LA.... Eddie.And after 2 years, he still found his way to them........to him.

entry.title: Hunger for you
entry.summary:
Author: LunaDusktreader

Rating: ExplicitLanguage: EnglishWords: 6,127Chapters: 13/36Kudos: 12

Summary: Buck has always known that the chemistry between him and Eddie was undeniable, but he never imagined that a simple moment of care could ignite such intense and forbidden desire. When Eddie begins to deal with the unexpected effects of lactation, the discomfort quickly turns into something new – a need that awakens unfamiliar sensations.At first, it is just an innocent touch, a gesture of support. But when Buck notices the way Eddie reacts, their gazes linger, their touches become more lingering, and the tension between them becomes impossible to ignore. Between hesitant whispers and bodies seeking each other, they discover a shared pleasure that scares and excites them in equal measure.What began as a moment of vulnerability turns into an explosion of desire and connection. But are they ready to accept what this means for the relationship they have built? Between surrender and uncertainty, Buck and Eddie will discover that, sometimes, hunger goes far beyond what can be controlled.

entry.title: best friends, ex-friends 'til the end (better off as lovers)
entry.summary:
Author: drakesword

Rating: Teen And Up AudiencesLanguage: EnglishWords: 48,482Chapters: 19/40Kudos: 46

Summary: Sometimes, Eddie feels so guilty that he throws up. He doesn’t mean to, but it’s like all the guilt and shame in his stomach overflows until he can’t contain it anymore, and it spills out of him.When he spends time with Buck, the guilt is there too.It’s there when he avoids his touch, while he pretends not to see the hurt expression in Buck’s face. It’s there when he tells him that, really, he’s fine. It’s there when he asks Buck to play basketball or watch some football with him instead of letting himself just listen to him ramble for hours and hours.It goes to sleep with him and wakes him up in the morning. It creeps itself into every corner of his body, and eventually settles under his skin like a second layer. Or; AU where Buck and Eddie meet in middle school and quickly become best friends. But as they grow up alongside each other, their dynamic evolves more and more into something Eddie is not quite ready to face.

entry.title: I Didn’t Mean to Be Something I’m Not Supposed To, but I Am. I Am.
entry.summary:
Author: schrijverr

Rating: MatureLanguage: EnglishWords: 16,221Chapters: 4/23Kudos: 182

Summary: After everything Buck and Eddie have gone through together, the marriage that was once just convenience is now real. They’re boyfriend-husbands, trying to figure out what their life looks like now that they’re dating and learning to be an actual couple.However, trouble arises with the promised trip back home to El Paso for the summer. Eddie is not ready to come out to his parents and Buck supports him in that. Still, El Paso is not the place where either of them have been their best and tensions arise between them when having to exist in the influence sphere of the Diaz parents. Everything that has happened between them catches up as personal histories, insecurities and unresolved issues float back up to the surface. AKA: The terrible, horrible, no good, very bad El Paso trip where Buck and Eddie's marriage of convenience has become a secret relationship instead.

entry.title: So, it’s all real?
entry.summary:
Author: hsholic

Rating: MatureLanguage: EnglishWords: 568Chapters: 1/1Kudos: 6

Summary: One morning, Bobby woke up from his long coma—though his body felt the same, he knew something inside him had shifted. He couldn’t say exactly what had changed, but it was there, quietly present beneath his skin. Marcy, on the other hand, refused to admit it. She clung to the idea that he was still the man she married, as if the coma had simply paused time instead of shaping a different version of him.

entry.title: Are you over me? (or under me)
entry.summary:
Author: Ficsthatfeellikefics

Rating: Teen And Up AudiencesLanguage: EnglishWords: 3,277Chapters: 1/1Kudos: 31

Summary: “I didn’t know then! And how come you never said anything to me, huh?” Eddie yells.“There was never a good time!” Buck says desperately.“Right because you only had 7 years, and we only hung out every night.”“Not- not- not… every night.” Buck tries. “And it’s not like I didn’t think to tell you, Eddie, but I thought you were straight! And things got in the way, like- dead-wife doppelgängers, and girlfriends, and and and… dead-wife doppelgängers.”“Hey there was only ONE dead-wife doppelgänger, ok, and do you even have a point?” Eddie says, huffing out a breath of air in frustration. Or - The rewrite of a few Ross and Rachel scenes as Buck and Eddie leading up to their first kiss

entry.title: not just another bloody mary
entry.summary:
Author: themorgue

Rating: Teen And Up AudiencesLanguage: EnglishWords: 5,371Chapters: 1/1Kudos: 7

Summary: While driving to get Chris, Buck and Eddie get an earworm from Ghost's Mary On A Cross. And unbeknownst to Eddie, Buck starts freaking out. Because what do you mean he's just been casually in love with his best friend? (And he didn't even know it!)So what does he do? Obviously, he doesn't do jackshit about it.

entry.title: All the Signs I Missed
entry.summary:
Author: IdoGeek

Rating: General AudiencesLanguage: EnglishWords: 7,487Chapters: 8/13Kudos: 213

Summary: It’s not a whisper, not exactly. It’s just… matter-of-fact. Like saying it out loud isn’t the hard part. Like waiting for a reaction is.The words drop between them, sudden and small, but precise.Eddie blinks, caught mid-step.“What?”Buck searches his face. Something subtle shifts behind his eyes. “Wait… you didn’t know?”There’s no accusation in it. Just confusion. Like it never occurred to him that Eddie wouldn’t know.Eddie stares, his brain a beat behind his body. “No, I—I didn’t.” OR Buck is trans and out. So out, that most people don't think about it anymore. So when Eddie joins the 118, no one mentions it. The question is, how long will it be, until Eddie finds out? finished and will be updated daily

entry.title: perfectly normal man
entry.summary:
Author: fernnette

Rating: ExplicitLanguage: EnglishWords: 4,657Chapters: 1/1Kudos: 133

Summary: “Is this my shirt?” Buck asked, unsuspecting as ever.Eddie swallowed his guilt and dropped to the other side of the couch, practically hugging the armrest. “Yeah, I must’ve grabbed it by accident. It’s clean.”And Buck just grinned, sniffed the shirt, and dropped it on the cushion beside him. “Smells better than when I took it off. Thanks, man.” OR, Eddie steals Buck's clothes because he's a freak.
